ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) package long grain and wild rice mix with herbs
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced Italian-style tomatoes, undrained

cookingTips: Don't skip browning the pork chops first—it adds depth to the final dish
Use the liquid from the canned vegetables to help cook the rice evenly
Keep the lid on while simmering to trap steam and ensure rice cooks through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the browning step and then explain how to create a proper steaming environment. Emphasize the importance of not removing the lid during cooking.
